name: Core_NonExistingFilePolicy
description: An enumeration of policies for opening a file in case of that the file does not exist.@(newline())
The enumeration elements cannot be combined.

elements.name: Core_NonExistingFilePolicy_Fail
elements.description: Fail if the file does not exist.

elements.name: Core_NonExistingFilePolicy_Create
elements.description: Create the file if it does not exist.
